page.title: 04GLEN CLOVA PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: The school is a stone building, with a slate roof. It has a modern brick built porch at the front. There are 4 pupils in Clova school. They are; me, Jennifer Edgar P.6,Claire Stephen, P.3, Fiona Edgar P.2,Dawn Hubbert, P. 1. Our teacher is called Mrs E.M. Hubbert. There are 5 pre-schoolers who will come to the school in the next few years.The roll from 1980-1985 has been: 1980/1981=8 1981/1982=8 1982/1983=4 1983/1984=6 1984/1985=4 In our classroom we have 1 colour T.V. which has 4 channels, 1 disk drive computer, 1 photo copier, 1 transistor radio, 1 piano, 2 quartz clocks, 7 blackboards, 3 tape recorders ( 2 cassette , 1 reel to reel) and modern formica topped tables and plastic chairs.There is fluorescent lighting and night storage heating.
